fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The caption to a photo of Tony Greenbank said it showed him in the Howgill Fells in the Lake District. The fells lie between the Lake District and the Yorkshire Dales (Obituaries, 17 October, page 9, Journal). • A recipe for date and chocolate Christmas cake in tomorrow’s Feast (page 17) gives the total baking time as one hour and 45 mins to two hours. That should say two hours and 15 minutes to two hours and 30 minutes. As well as lining the tin, extend the paper about 10cm above the rim. • Other recently amended articles include: Whale sculpture stops Dutch train crashing into water Rocky Horror’s Richard O’Brien: ‘I should be dead. I’ve had an excessive lifestyle’ How would we split profits from unequal contributions to house purchase? Macron outlines new law to prevent ‘Islamist separatism’ in France ‘Prevent, discourage, confront’: South American states tackle Chinese fishing boats ‘Don’t stop the music’: songs bring hope to a Nigerian psychiatric unit
